Actively Prepare for Your Future Career
Explore: Visit the Career Center to discover your strengths and possibilities for future success
Engage: Attend Career Center events and workshops or utilize our resources to connect with yourself, employers and the world at large
Execute: Take action by scheduling an appointment with your College Career Specialist
 
 

Career Center Drive-Thru & Career Specialist Drop-In Hours  

Take action by stopping by Virtually or In-Person for a quick 10-15 minute session with
a Career Coach at Drive-Thru or meet with your Career Specialist during their
Student Success Center drop-in hours.
  Drive-Thru                           

Spring 2023 Drive-Thru Hours - Hybrid (In-Person LH-208 & Virtual):
Monday - Thursday: 10am - 2:45pm - Hybrid



Extended Hours:
Tuesday 4pm - 6:45pm - Virtual Only


Friday: 10am - 12:45pm - Hybrid              

ZOOM THROUGH FOR A QUICK GENERAL QUESTION
Have a quick general question? Ask our Virtual Front Desk   

You can also submit an inquiry online right here



Monday - Friday: 
9am - 12pm and 1:30pm - 4pm
    
















Titan Connection


 









Students

Are you a CSUF student looking for a part-time on-campus job, internship, full time career or volunteer opportunity? Titan Connection is your access to hundreds of these opportunities just for Titans and much more. To access Titan Connection click on "Find a Job".

Find a Job



 





Recruiters

CSUF Titans are Career Ready. They come prepared with experience for the professional world and are eager to be your source of talent and pipeline of your organization's next generation of new leaders. If you are a recruiter looking to hire a talented Titan and promote your opportunities then make sure to click on "Post a job".

Post a Job



 










Schedule Appointment
Now you can schedule an In-Person or Virtual Career Counseling appointment online through TitanNet!
Meet with a College Career Specialist or Career Coach In-Person & Virtually on various topics including: graduate school, interview preparation, major/career exploration and many more. 
Schedule your appointment now using TitanNet





NOTE: Effective September 7, 2022, Scheduled Appointments (In-Person and Virtual) will now be provided through Titan Net for all Colleges. Appointments will no longer be accessed through Titan Connection. 



 
 

Schedule Appointment
